task.title: Print Pay Documents
task.shortdesc: Print employee pay checks for each pay group.

context.p: The Pay Documents are available from the File Transfers page (Menu > Administration > Reporting > File Transfers). The Check Positive Pay file is available when printing live checks.
Confirm receipt and totals with your bank.

note.p: Once the checks have been printed, the payroll cannot be modified.

step.cmd: From the Payroll Overview page, select Print. All calculated transactions are printed, and checks are generated. If a third party prints the checks, the check export files are generated.
From the File Transfers page, review your Check Positive Pay file.
Validate that your bank file totals balance to your Pre-Check Summary Liability Listing (specific to bank required process).
Verify the check totals using the Pay Check Register standard report.
